All right, perhaps I wasn't clear.  To simplify I'll use bullet points:

-No swearing. (That's all I promise.)

-Not a good idea to insult those in charge, I won't exact retribution but 
it's just not a 
   good way to build goodwill which would make it easier to get your ideas 
heard. (In  
   other words I was just starting to respect you and you blew it.)

-If you have a problem with something I say you take it up with me. (Don't 
try and 
   build up resentment against me, I'm not that hated yet.  I should know 
what it 
   takes, I engineered the first recent overthrow of the former council 
namely KSL and 
   JP)

-I admit that, perhaps I misread what you recommended, but that doesn't solve 
the 
   other problem. (You still need to come back with a solution, unless you've 
given up 
   on the idea.

-This is the end of this discussion, anyone replying to this message over the 
group 
   will be suspended for one week. (ANYONE.)

--part1_1a1.113d0e0.29f4ccd9_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
